data.message:
I couldn't believe that @Eminem drew a line in the sand.
 I didn't realize I had to decide where to stand. 

  He doesn't want you as a fan, 
If you won't  surrender your opinion to the will of this uneducated man.

He places his hand held high in a fist,
 I get that he dont like whats going on and he's pissed.

If I like Trump, fuck me, I've got to go?
  Even though Ive followed you since The Eminem Show.

Well Im too old for rap now, but so are you
 So go back to being obsolete,  and  Fuck You too!

replies.message:
Hey Em, what did I miss?  
When did you grow a vagina and a set of tits?
Flicking your clit and cashin' in cheques..
...from the Clinton foundation - back turned to the nation.
You're a coward, heading in a downward direction.

Pussy hat too tight?  Em, you ain't thinking right!
Too many Percocet might have left your brain frost bit.
You used to be a prophet,
Now you're just in it for profit.
Maybe it's too late 'n'..
..now you're ridin shotgun with Satan. 
Straighten your shit out Em, 
Cause we need you back in the game!
